amendment.description: To provide funds to increase maritime security.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1341 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 294.
Amendment SA 1341 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S9758-9763; text: CR S9758) To provide funds to increase maritime security.
